metadata.title: GA√èA
description: Guitarist Lionel Loueke will release his remarkable rock-infused fourth Blue Note album GAIA, on 10/30. The album, recorded live at Sear Sound studio with an intimate audience in attendance, was produced by Blue Note president Don Was and features Massimo Biolcati on bass & Ferenc Nemeth on drums. GAIA presents 11 original compositions along with a spry version of the Bee Gees hit "How Deep Is Your Love." US tour dates coming this Fall.
